knimeNode.name: QCIonInjectionTimeReader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads QC Ion injection time summary from a CSV file generated with the QCExporter.

fullDescription.intro: Reads QC Ion injection time summary from a CSV file generated with the QCExporter.

ports.inPort: CSV file containing the QC Ion injection time summary created by the QCExporter.
ports.outPort: Table containing the QC Ion injection time summary.
